statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name // \"Claude\""); branch=$(git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); current=$(date +%s); last_commit=$(git --no-optional-locks log -1 --format=%ct 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$last_commit" ]; then commit_hrs=$(((current - last_commit) / 3600)); commit_time=$([ $commit_hrs -eq 0 ] && echo "<1h" || echo "${commit_hrs}h"); else commit_time="n/a"; fi; remote=$(git --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref @{u} 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$remote" ]; then last_push=$(git --no-optional-locks log -1 --format=%ct "$remote" 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$last_push" ]; then push_hrs=$(((current - last_push) / 3600)); push_time=$([ $push_hrs -eq 0 ] && echo "<1h" || echo "${push_hrs}h"); else push_time="n/a"; fi; else push_time="no-remote"; fi; printf "%s | %s | commit: %s ago | push: %s ago" "$model" "$branch" "$commit_time" "$push_time"'
